Class SAT4JModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.inject.AbstractModule

          • org.opt4j.satdecoding.sat4j.SAT4JModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module

    public class SAT4JModule
extends SATModule
    The SAT4JModule enables and configures the SAT4JSolver.
